casebody.data:
NEXT ADVISOR CONTINUED, INC.
v.
LENDINGTREE, INC., et al. 391A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2016 Russell F. Sizemore, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Watkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mary Cabell Clay, Attorney at Law, Glenn E. Ketner, III, Attorney at Law, Scott M. Tyler, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Lendingtree, Inc., et al. Christopher G. Smith, Attorney at Law, Susan H. Hargrove, Attorney at Law, Isaac A. Linnartz, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Next Advisor Continued, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of December 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of December 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 6th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
